Package oop.ex6.Scopes

Class Scope

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.ex6.Scopes.Scope
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalScope, MethodScope

    public class Scope
extends java.lang.Object
    A class implementing a generic scope's node.

    • Method Detail

      • declareVariable

        public void declareVariable​(java.lang.String variableName,
                            boolean isFinal,
                            boolean isArgument,
                            java.lang.String type,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws IllegalDeclarationException,
                            TypeNotSupportedException,
                            IncompatibleTypeException
        Tries to declare a new variable by adding it to the scope's scopeVariables HashMap.
        Parameters:
        variableName - The name of the variable to be declared.
        isFinal - A boolean value, Indicating whether the variable is final or not.
        isArgument - A boolean value, Indicating whether the variable is a method argument or not.
        type - The variable's type as String.
        value - The value to be assigned to the new variable.
        Throws:
        IllegalDeclarationException - Thrown if the declaration's illegal.
        TypeNotSupportedException - Thrown if the variable's type isn't supported by s-Java.
        IncompatibleTypeException - Thrown if the value's type isn't compatible with the variable's.

      • assignValueToVariable

        public void assignValueToVariable​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> assignment)
                           throws IllegalOperationException,
                                  TypeNotSupportedException,
                                  IncompatibleTypeException
        Checks if variableName is a declared variable and if it is, is it legal for it to be assigned with a given value - valueName. It returns nothing and throws no exceptions if the assignment's legal.
        Parameters:
        assignment - a HashMap containing a variable's name as key and a value as value.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationException - Thrown if the assignment is illegal.
        TypeNotSupportedException - Thrown if value's type isn't supported by s-Java.
        IncompatibleTypeException - Thrown if the value's type is incompatible with the variable's.

      • getParent

        public Scope getParent​()
        Returns:
        This scope's parent.

      • checkParameters

        public void checkParameters​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parameters)
                     throws IncompatibleTypeException
        Check if the given boolean parameters (as condition) are valid.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The given boolean parameters.
        Throws:
        IncompatibleTypeException - Thrown if the value's type is incompatible with the variable's.

      • getScopeType

        public java.lang.String getScopeType​()
        Returns:
        This scope's type.

      • validateMethodCall

        public void validateMethodCall​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> callElements)
                        throws IllegalOperationException,
                               IncompatibleTypeException
        Validate a method call line of code (check the method name and arguments).
        Parameters:
        callElements - A hash map with the method's name as key and the arguments as an ArrayList of String (in the value slot).
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationException - Thrown if the assignment is illegal.
        IncompatibleTypeException - Thrown if the value's type is incompatible with the variable's.
